name: The Farm (itch) (0zanM)
description:
Description :

You go to a venue to investigate the mysterious death of a woman.

And when you get there, you meet a surprise. You have to deal with the killer.

Controls :

Left Click --> Interact

Right Click --> Drink :)

W-A-S-D --> Move

'F' --> Turn on/off your flashlight

ESC --> Pause

Credits :
